tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am writing  this for my mother. She underwent surgery fir cervical spine with Dr. Rakesh Dhake sir. My mom had ACDF cervical surgery. I am happy to say that she was so much better and pain free in 2 days after surgery. Her arm pain is completely gone. Many thanks to Dhake sir. Dr. Rakesh Dhake sir is a very good person and a best spine doctor in Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello everyone, 
This is Nitin tonde.
I would like to share my excellent experience with Dr. Rakesh dhake.
Actually my mom had complaint about back pain so after doing all possible treatment our family doctor Dr.Khandeparkar sent us to Dr. Rakesh.
In first meeting only he explained everything to me and mom about treatment and he explained so well that my gets ready to do small surgery too.
Every time meeting with doctor is like boost up tonic.
We had great experience with him and he comes to our life like an angel 
Now it has been almost 2 moths for surgery and my mom doing well and that pain and agony which she had earlier that gets vanished now.
Thanks to Dr. Rakesh Dhake.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rakesh ** ********** ************* *** took time to explain my dad diagnosis thoroughly, his compassion and genuine concern made us all feel at ease, especially my dad who had a surgery. Dr Rakesh expertise and patience in addressing my dad’s health issue ( spine problem ) were impressive. I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rakesh did a spine implant surgery of my mother (69 yrs) at Siddhanchal hospital, Lower Parel. It went well, and after over a month now, she is feeling better in terms of her pain. The doctor's clinic is well maintained and his availability at his clinic as well as his reachability over phone call, whatsapp, etc. during any emergency is very flexible.

tags: Wait time,
review: Dr. Rakesh Dhake operated me yesterday for my back problem. I had severe pain when moving and geting out of bed. Sir operated me yesterday in Andheri. It's less than 24 hours and I am already feeling so much better and pain free. I have already walked today with physio. *** ****** ***** *** ** *** **** ***** ******* ** ****** *** I can blindly recommend him to anyone with spine issue. What is best about him is he is so down to earth and approachable that I feel free to ask him anything. God bless him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: \"Dr. Rakesh is exceptionally friendly and helpful. He provided outstanding support from pre-hospitalization to discharge, and even assisted with the insurance documentation. Our experience with him was truly remarkable.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: My wife was suffering from TB of spine and was unable to walk due to pain. Rakesh sir explained us the problem and performed fixatiom surgery on my wife's spine. She is now good and pain is better. ***** ****** ** *** **** ***** ********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very excellent surgeon,not only did he diagnose the problem but also provided proper treatment, guidance, and follow-up.
Thanks Rakesh Sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother was suffering from severe low back pain and sciatica. We came to Dr. Rakesh dhake sir for that and he explained us everything in detail. She underwent surgery for spine and now is much better without pain. *** ****** ***** *** ** *** **** ***** *******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am immensely grateful to Dr. Rakesh Dhake for the exceptional care provided to my father during his spine surgery. From the initial consultation to the post-operative follow-ups, Dr. Rakesh Dhake demonstrated unparalleled expertise, professionalism, and compassion.The surgery itself was a success, and my father is now on the road to a remarkable recovery. Dr. Rakesh Dhake's skillful hands and thorough approach have made all the difference in my father's health and well-being.Not only did Dr. Rakesh Dhake provide excellent surgical care, but the entire team also ensured we were well-informed and supported throughout the process.I highly recommend Dr. Rakesh Dhake to anyone in need of spine surgery or related medical care. Thank you, Dr. Rakesh Dhake, for your outstanding work and for giving my father a new lease on life.

review: Extremely talented Dr.....really fortunate to have met him....he operated my grandmother who is 81 years old....she was having pain and numbness in her legs due to compression of nerves...Dr Rakesh cleared all our doubts...

tags: None
review: My father who is 64 year old was having spine related issue and it was that much severe that he was unable stand or walk even 10 steps. His regit leg was completely not workingm We contacted with Dr. Dhake and he has operated him with fusion and implants. Now after one month of surgery my father is quite well, walking without walker more than 500 steps and his wounds is also removed. Dr. Dhake is very supportive and calm and his response is also very satisfactory. I will recommend him to meet once if anyone have specific issues related to spin.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Rakesh is a very very professional doctor. He knows exactly what the problem is and the exact solution for it. He uses all the latest technologies to relieve the pain. My mother who is 74 years old has undergone fusion surgery L3-L4-L5 TLIF. She has been operated at Sahaydri hospital, Nashik. She was suffering from sciatica pain and numbness for the last 15 years. We were always scared when it came to getting her surgery done. For the last few months, the pain has been unbearable and she was not able to stand or walk for more than 2-3 mins. Thanks to sir for the timely rescue. No doubt it will take time for her to recover but the surgery went well and the symptoms have weaned off. I highly recommend Dr Rakesh for spinal treatments. Thank you Sir.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My mother was suffering from to much back pain since last 3-4 years but 
I am so grateful that my mother's spine surgery were done by doctor Rakesh Dhake sir .Sir is the best doctor and Divine being for us . I am very happy with your way of treating to my mumma. 
It has been 3 months since the operation and my mumma is now fully recovered ..no pain..no medicine she is very well now...
Doctor is Very friendly and helpful. He is not only an Excellent Doctor , he is simple, superb Human being, Sober, approachable,Gave us loads of information on the best way to recover and what to expect moving forward with treatment...
The surgery was a big success and my mumma has  made a faster recovery than expected...
Thank you so much Sir..
May God  bless you and give you a very long life to serve the suffering people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted with Dr. Rakesh Dhake for my husband who had L5 disc bulge. During our first consultation with him, he was quick to diagnose and give us full information regarding the problem and the need for surgery. He patiently explained the pros and cons of the surgery, which put us at ease with our concerns. My husband under went the surgery in feb  is recuperating well. He is no longer suffering from pain in his leg due to the pinched nerve. Our family is grateful to Dr.  Rakesh Dhake for his timely guidance and exceptional patient care provided by him and his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Dhake operated my husband for spine and leg issues in a complex situation, with extreme care, proficiency and dedication. He is definitely one of the best spine surgeons in Nashik and we are greatly satisfied to have known him.

He cares for his patients deeply, which was shown by his regular follow-ups. He is very approachable and hence we highly recommend him further!
